title: Why is it I keep getting level 30s on my team all the time? I'm in Silver 3.
body: Someone please tell me what's going on.

replies.body: newbies are placed around low gold high silver

I assume that by "level 30s" you mean "unranked" since everyone, from Bronze 5 to Challenger, is level 30 (yes, it really is an important distinction). That said, players who are new to ranked start with an MMR equivalent to Silver 5 and the 10 placement games they play have a much higher impact on MMR than any games they would play after being placed. Any player who's new to ranked who starts with several consecutive wins would end up being matched in mid silver during their placements.
So that's why I get people who play their first ranked game in my games at the moment?

If it's their first ranked game of the season, then it's likely they finished in high Silver - low Gold last season. If it's their first ranked game ever (and they're not queued with others) then it's likely your MMR is lower than your rank.
hey mate i somtimes get the same thing on my silver 2 main and its really annoying

you are in the same MMR which the game places the new unranked players ... my advice is to always check your teammates in op.gg and if they are total newbies that have scores like 2-15-1, then DODGE ... -3 lp and 5 minute ban is quite a cheap price to pay for your sanity, MMR and 40 minutes of your time.

do not that a second dodge gives you -10 lp penalty and 30 minutes ban.
